articles.author: Amar Pal Singh Bhalla
articles.title: SA vs IND 2023, 2nd T20I: St George's Park Pitch Report, Gqeberha Weather Forecast, T20I Stats & Records | South Africa vs India - Cricket Times
articles.description: South Africa will take on India in the second T20I on Tuesday. The clash will take place at the St George's Park in Gqeberha.
articles.content:
The second T20I between India and South Africa is set to take place at St George’s Park in Gqeberha on Tuesday, December 12.
The opening match of the three-game series in Durban was abandoned due to… [+1877 chars]
